hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf ./* export WS=`pwd` sudo zypper refresh sudo zypper update -y #Install dependencies from repo sudo zypper install -y git wget tar java-1_8_0-openjdk-devel ant liberation-fonts net-tools
#Set JAVA_HOME export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib64/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version
#Get Jmeter source cd $WS git clone https://github.com/apache/jmeter.git
#Get Jmeter binary wget http://apache.forsale.plus//jmeter/binaries/apache-jmeter-4.0.tgz tar -xvzf apache-jmeter-4.0.tgz #rm $PWD/jmeter/bin/ApacheJMeter.jar cp -Rf $WS/apache-jmeter-4.0/bin/ApacheJMeter.jar $WS/jmeter/bin/
cd jmeter/ pwd git checkout v4_0 ant download_jars
#Skip expected failures cp build.xml build.xml.orig sed -i -e 's/property name="skip.batchtest_SlowCharsFeature" value="false"/property name="skip.batchtest_SlowCharsFeature" value="true"/g' build.xml sed -i -e 's/property name="skip.batchtest_TestKeepAlive" value="false"/property name="skip.batchtest_TestKeepAlive" value="true"/g' build.xml diff -u build.xml.orig build.xml || true
#Increase timeout cp bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx.orig sed -i '173d' bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx sed -i '172along maxDurationPlusMargin = vars["MaxDuration"].toInteger()*100000+500;' bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx diff -u bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx.orig bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx || true
#Run tests ant test -Djava.awt.headless=true
#Comment out G1GC algorithm as it is unimplemented in OpenJDK zero cp bin/jmeter bin/jmeter.orig sed -i '178d' bin/jmeter sed -i '177a# : "${GC_ALGO:="-XX:+UseG1GC -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=100 -XX:G1ReservePercent=20"}" ' bin/jmeter diff -u bin/jmeter.orig bin/jmeter || true
#Verify export PATH=$PATH:`pwd`/bin/ jmeter --version
